K2 BlackPearl, ASP.NET, C#, Web Services, Angular JS, ASP, XML, XSL, VB Script, Power builder,
Visual Basic, C, VC++, Access, oracle and other COTs applications.
- Designed, developed, deployed and maintained several custom SharePoint solutions.
- Advocated the use of SharePoint development best practices, methodologies and procedures for
delivery.
- Conducted several SharePoint training sessions targeting Business users, developers and
administrators.
- Created SharePoint COE and manage SharePoint governance board processes, and procedures.
- Planned, Designed and Implemented Extranet and Intranet facing SharePoint Server sites.
- Designed, developed, implemented and maintained several workflow applications using K2.NET, K2
Black Pearl, MOSS and InfoPath.
- Lead and develop security software products Design freeware and commercial software online
and utilized by thousands of consumers world-wide Coded.
- Optimized and developed the following web applications using C#.Net and SQL Server Database
and SSIS o employerpartnership.org US Army-Employer.
- Utilized MVC ASP.NET Framework, Test-Driven Development (TDD), SVN Source Control and Cruise
Control Build Systems.
- Maintained and enhance existing public website and internal web applications using C#.Net
MVC Framework for C# & SQL Server with ORM Database Mapping.
- Analyzed business requirements and provided architecture solutions based upon changing business
requirements.
- Developed cloud computing integrations using Salesforce.com CRM and Google APIs along with C#.Net.
- Lead architect responsible for technical oversight and technical delivery of core investment
product.

skills.keywords: MVC, C#, AngularJS, Oracle Database, SQL Server, Project Management, CSS3, JQuery.
